tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_primaryprogram_cached AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN (ap.program_setting = 3) THEN t.name ELSE NULL::character varying END AS name, ap.amp_program_id, ap.program_percentage, ap.program_setting FROM ((amp_activity a LEFT JOIN amp_activity_program ap ON ((a.amp_activity_id = ap.amp_activity_id))) LEFT JOIN amp_theme t ON ((t.amp_theme_id = ap.amp_program_id))) ORDER BY a.amp_activity_id, t.name;;;
